newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico stocks end at another record close.
newsitem.headline: Mexico stocks end at another record close.

text.p: Mexican shares ended trade at an another unofficial record high on Thursday.

Dealers and analysts said stocks had pared some of their earlier gains due to profit-taking after Wall Street's early close, but prices were still up after a wave of foreign buying ahead of a long Independence Day weekend on U.S. markets.
Preliminary figures sowed the leading IPC share index .MXX was up 35.01 points when the closing bell rang, or 0.77 percent, at an historic level of 4,594.24.
